comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Same Agence Meurisse photo on Gallica site, with caption: A Soissons : chasseur d'Afrique assistant à l'agonie de son cheval tué pendant le bombardement At Soissons: African Chasseur at the agony of his horse killed during the bombing (A Chasseur was a light cavalryman: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chasseur#Chasseurs_.C3.A0_cheval ) gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041684g Pub. date 1914

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  thank you for finding the matching Gallica image with the more emotional original  title. We will add more details when we update the image description.
